Articles.Content: Is there a present day save file available on the forums for download? I want to play a modern-day campaign without recreating the Apollo/Sojourner/Venera missions, as well as not needing to worry about KEO comsats.

Not sure what you mean? Are you talking about a mod?

If you just want to skip the low tech part of early career, you can cheat yourself enough money, reputation, and science to skip it.

3 hours ago, bewing said:

If you just want to skip the low tech part of early career, you can cheat yourself enough money, reputation, and science to skip it.

^This. As for the sattelites you can jut build it and use [Cheats] [set orbit] in debug menu to put then in place. Or just disable comnet,
You might want to get the Kommunity Space Station save file.  It has a lot of stuff already in it.
